text: Nick Zedd (May 8, 1958 â€“ February 27, 2022) was an American filmmaker, author, and painter. He helped create the term Cinema of Transgression in 1985. His best known movie was the 1983 comedy horror Geek Maggot Bingo. Zedd died from cirrhosis caused by liver cancer and hepatitis C in Mexico City, Mexico on February 27, 2022, at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Deaths from hepatitis Category:Movie directors from Maryland Category:American movie producers Category:Screenwriters from Maryland Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Writers from Baltimore
